javadoc:
A {@link JCheckBox} that has HTML rendering disabled.

See also:
ClassHTML renderingDescription
{@link GCheckBox}NOHTML disabled JCheckBox
{@link GHtmlCheckBox}YESHTML allowed JCheckBox

methods.javadoc:
Creates a check box with no text or icon, with HTML rendering disabled.

See {@link JCheckBox#JCheckBox()}
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a check box with no text or icon, with HTML rendering disabled.
 
 See JCheckBox#JCheckBox()

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a check box with an icon, with HTML rendering disabled.
 
 See JCheckBox#JCheckBox(Icon)

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a check box with an icon and initial selected state, with HTML rendering disabled.
 
 See JCheckBox#JCheckBox(Icon, boolean)

params.name: selected
params.comment: initial selection state, true means selected

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a check box with the specified text, with HTML rendering disabled.
 
 See JCheckBox#JCheckBox(String)

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a check box where properties are taken from the
 Action supplied, with HTML rendering disabled.
 
 See JCheckBox#JCheckBox(Action)

params.name: a
params.comment: used to specify the new check box

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a check box with the specified text and initial selected state, with HTML
 rendering disabled.

params.name: selected
params.comment: initial selection state, true means selected

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a check box with the specified text and icon, with HTML rendering disabled.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a check box with the specified text and icon and initial selected state,
 with HTML rendering disabled.

params.name: selected
params.comment: initial selection state, true means selected

methods.javadoc:
See {@link JCheckBox#setText(String)}.

Overridden to warn about HTML text in non-HTML enabled checkbox. @param text string this label will display
methods.name: setText
methods.comment:
See JCheckBox#setText(String).
 
 Overridden to warn about HTML text in non-HTML enabled checkbox.

name: GCheckBox
comment:
A JCheckBox that has HTML rendering disabled.
 
 See also:
 
 	ClassHTML renderingDescription
  GCheckBoxNOHTML disabled JCheckBox
  GHtmlCheckBoxYESHTML allowed JCheckBox
